title: Little Rock PD dispatch archive
subtitle: Compiled for the Arkansas Democrat-Gazette
description: This is an archive of all the dispatch calls recorded by the Little Rock Police Department dating to 04/13/22. The dataset updates every hour with the latest reports. Every day the dataset updates with a new csv. Orginal dispatches for the last 8 hours can be found at: https://clrweb.littlerock.state.ar.us/pub/public_menu.php.
